we stayed in a cheap narrow room  we knew we needed a room where we could spend the night so if you are looking for such a hotel the cheap room is enough the room is really small the bed is really small except for the mini fridge if you want to open a large suitcase you can not open it the bathroom toilet is enough the room you give you for the night provides you with the basic conditions for staying the bed pillows comfortable toilet the bathroom was clean we stayed the night if we wanted to stay the second night the room could catch our eyes the night was tolerated the internet does not work in the room the wifi password can be requested location 
in terms of walking distance to everywhere
